trans-unit.target: 在呈現控制項之多個執行個體的資料繫結情節中，遞增值會插入控制項之 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> 值的前面。

trans-unit.source: Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).
trans-unit.target: 各區段是以底線字元 (_) 分隔。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm was used in versions of ASP.NET earlier than ASP.NET 4.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 4 之前版本的 ASP.NET 中使用此演算法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value is set to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> 值設定為 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a naming container, the control is used as the top of the hierarchy of naming containers for any controls that it contains.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項是命名容器，則對於其包含的所有控制項而言，會用來做為命名容器之階層架構的最上層。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm is used for controls that are in data-bound controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個演算法用於資料繫結控制項中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value is generated by concatenating the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value of the parent naming container with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> value of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> 值是透過串連父命名容器的 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> 值與控制項的 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> 值產生。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a data-bound control that generates multiple rows, the value of the data field specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A> property is added at the end.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項是資料繫結控制項，並且會產生多個資料列，則 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A> 屬性中指定之資料欄位的值會加入結尾處。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, multiple data fields can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 針對 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 控制項，可以指定多個資料欄位。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A> property is blank, a sequential number is added at the end instead of a data-field value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A>屬性為空白，循序數字結尾處加入，而不是資料欄位值。

trans-unit.source: This number begins at zero and is incremented by 1 for each row.
trans-unit.target: 這個號碼從零開始，就會遞增 1，每個資料列。

trans-unit.source: Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).
trans-unit.target: 各區段是以底線字元 (_) 分隔。

trans-unit.source: The control inherits the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode> setting of its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> control.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項會繼承其 <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode> 控制項的 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> 設定。

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> for a page is <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>頁面是<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable>。

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> for a control is <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Inherit>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>控制項是<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Inherit>。

trans-unit.source: Because the default for controls is <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Inherit>, the default generation mode is <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable>.
trans-unit.target: 因為控制項的預設值是<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Inherit>，模式是預設產生<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable>。

trans-unit.source: (However, if you use Visual Studio to convert a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the site default to <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.AutoID> in the Web.config file.)
trans-unit.target: (不過，如果您使用 Visual Studio Web 專案轉換至 ASP.NET 4，從較早版本時，Visual Studio 會自動設定網站預設<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.AutoID>Web.config 檔案中。)

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [ASP.NET 網頁伺服器控制項識別](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controls that are contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項中所包含的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A> property is set to `ProductID`.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A>屬性設定為`ProductID`。

trans-unit.source: In the rendered HTML, this creates three `span` elements that correspond to three `ProductIDLabel` controls.
trans-unit.target: 在呈現的 HTML 中，這會建立三個`span`對應至三個元素`ProductIDLabel`控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the page runs, the `id` attributes for the `span` elements are set to the following values:
trans-unit.target: 當頁面執行，則`id`屬性`span`元素設為下列值：

trans-unit.source: Gets a character value representing the separator character used in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得字元值，表示在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 屬性中所使用的分隔字元。

trans-unit.source: Always returns the underscore character (_).
trans-unit.target: 永遠傳回底線字元 (_)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value is generated by concatenating the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> value of the control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> value of its parent control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>藉由串連所產生值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>控制項的值和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>其父控制項的值。

trans-unit.source: Each part of the generated <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property is separated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDSeparator%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 所產生的每個部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性會以區隔<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDSeparator%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The value always returns an underscore (_).
trans-unit.target: 值一律會傳回底線 (_)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> object associated with the server control for the current Web request.
trans-unit.target: 取得與目前 Web 要求的伺服器控制項關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> object associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: 與目前要求相關之指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This property gives you access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object for the current Web request.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您存取<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>目前 Web 要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object provides properties that access the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Application%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> and other objects that contain information about the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 此物件提供屬性，存取<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Application%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>，<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>和其他物件，包含目前 HTTP 要求的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: It also provides methods that allow you to obtain configuration information and set or clear errors for the request.
trans-unit.target: 它也提供方法，可讓您取得組態資訊並設定或清除要求的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> object that represents the child controls for a specified server control in the UI hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> 物件，表示 UI 階層架構中指定之伺服器控制項的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: The collection of child controls for the specified server control.
trans-unit.target: 指定之伺服器控制項的子控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: On an ASP.NET page, when controls are added declaratively between the opening and closing tags of a server control, ASP.NET automatically adds the controls to the containing server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 頁面上，開頭和結尾標記的伺服器控制項之間以宣告方式加入控制項時 ASP.NET 自動將控制項加入至包含的伺服器控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Any HTML tags or text strings that are not processed on the server are treated as <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> objects.
trans-unit.target: 任何 HTML 標記或不會處理伺服器的文字字串會被視為<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>物件。

trans-unit.source: These are added to the collection like other server controls.
trans-unit.target: 如同其他伺服器控制項集合來新增這些。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> property allows you programmatic access to the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> class for any server control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>屬性可讓您以程式設計方式存取的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>任何伺服器控制項的類別。

trans-unit.source: You can add controls to the collection, remove controls from the collection, or iterate through the server controls in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將控制項加入至集合，移除控制項的集合，或逐一查看集合中的伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add child controls to a server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object through its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將伺服器控制項的子控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>物件透過其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> property, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureChildControls" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" />屬性，請務必呼叫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureChildControls" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, if you are planning to add controls to the controls collection programmatically, consider adding the controls in an overridden <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果您打算以程式設計方式將控制項加入 controls 集合，請考慮將控制項加入在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify server controls that use composition-based implementation to create any child controls they contain in preparation for posting back or rendering.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫，通知使用組合實作的伺服器控制項來建立所包含的任何子控制項，以準備回傳或呈現。

trans-unit.source: When you develop a composite or templated server control, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 當您開發了複合或樣板化的伺服器控制項時，您必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Controls that override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A> method should implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface to avoid naming conflicts.
trans-unit.target: 控制該覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A>方法應該實作<xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>介面，以避免命名衝突。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae) and [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 伺服器控制項樣板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae)和[開發自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates an overridden version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何覆寫的版本的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the composite control displays a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control enclosed in two literal controls that render HTML.
trans-unit.target: 在此實作中，顯示複合控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>括在兩個常值的控制項，呈現 HTML 控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> object to hold the child controls (both literal and server) of the server control.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> 物件來保存伺服器控制項的子控制項 (常值和伺服器)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> object to contain the current server control's child server controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> 物件，包含目前伺服器控制項的子伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Override this method in a custom server control if you have created a collection object that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫自訂伺服器控制項中的，這個方法，如果您已經建立一個集合物件，衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can then instantiate that collection class in the override of this method.
trans-unit.target: 然後可以具現化該覆寫這個方法中的集合類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateControlCollection%2A> method to create an instance of a `CustomControlCollection` class, which inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateControlCollection%2A>方法建立的執行個體`CustomControlCollection`類別，繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateControlCollection%2A> method in a custom server control override of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateControlCollection%2A>自訂的伺服器控制項中的方法覆寫的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The new collection is created, and then populated with two child controls, `firstControl` and `secondControl`.
trans-unit.target: 新集合時建立，並以兩個的子控制項，然後填入`firstControl`和`secondControl`。

trans-unit.source: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 將資料來源繫結至所叫用的伺服器控制項及其所有子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 將資料來源繫結至所叫用的伺服器控制項及其所有子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to bind data from a source to a server control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法將資料從來源繫結至伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used after retrieving a dataset through a database query.
trans-unit.target: 擷取透過資料庫查詢資料集之後，通常會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Most controls perform data binding automatically, which means that you typically do not need to call this method explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 大部分控制項執行資料繫結會自動，這表示，您通常不需要明確地呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly overridden when you create a custom templated data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立自訂的範本資料繫結控制項時，通常會覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create Templated ASP.NET User Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07664410-02dd-4494-af53-a9259741d4f2) and [Developing Custom Data-Bound Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88fe02a3-957f-4ff7-84f5-2d7ab78db4c1).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立樣板化的 ASP.NET 使用者控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07664410-02dd-4494-af53-a9259741d4f2)和[開發自訂資料繫結的 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88fe02a3-957f-4ff7-84f5-2d7ab78db4c1)。

trans-unit.source: When called on a server control, this method resolves all data-binding expressions in the server control and in any of its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器控制項上呼叫時，這個方法會解析伺服器控制項和任何其子控制項中的所有資料繫結運算式。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method in a custom ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項中的方法。

trans-unit.source: It begins by calling the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A> method and then uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to delete all the child controls and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A> method to delete any saved view-state settings for those child controls.
trans-unit.target: 它一開始會藉由呼叫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A>方法，然後使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以刪除所有子控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A>方法，以都刪除任何儲存的檢視狀態設定為這些子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A> property is set to `true` and the control is instructed to track any changes to the view state of the newly created controls with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A>屬性設定為`true`和控制項所指示的位置是新建立之控制項的檢視狀態來追蹤變更<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This is a common technique when binding data to a control to ensure that new data does not conflict with data stored from a previous <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 這是常見的技術時將資料繫結至控制項，以確保該新的資料從先前所儲存的資料不會衝突<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> event is raised; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> 事件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls with an option to raise the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 使用會引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> 事件的選項，繫結資料來源至叫用的伺服器控制項及其所有子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a scenario when your custom control overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method and implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法覆寫自訂控制項時的案例中<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法，而且會實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>介面。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the custom control calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with `raiseOnDataBinding` set to `false` to ensure that the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method gets called.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，呼叫自訂控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法`raiseOnDataBinding`設`false`，確保基底類別的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>取得呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind?displayProperty=nameWithType> method invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with `raiseOnDataBinding` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會叫用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法`raiseOnDataBinding`設`true`。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with `raiseOnDataBinding` set to `false` causes any child controls to be data bound with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法`raiseOnDataBinding`設`false`造成任何子控制項，以進行資料繫結與<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Binds a data source to the server control's child controls.
trans-unit.target: 繫結資料來源至伺服器控制項的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBindChildren%2A> method to bind a data source to the child controls of a server control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBindChildren%2A>資料來源繫結至的伺服器控制項的子控制項的方法。

trans-unit.source: When called on a server control, this method does not bind data to the control.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器控制項上呼叫時，這個方法不會不將資料繫結至控制項。

trans-unit.source: To bind a server control and all its child controls, call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將伺服器控制項和其所有子控制項繫結，呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the server control binds to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 發生於伺服器控制項繫結至資料來源時。

trans-unit.source: This event notifies the server control to perform any data-binding logic that has been written for it.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會通知伺服器控制項，執行任何已寫入它的資料繫結邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the naming container if the naming container implements <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果命名容器實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer" />，則取得命名容器的參考。

trans-unit.source: The naming container.
trans-unit.target: 命名容器。

trans-unit.source: In a hierarchy of naming containers that implement <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer" />, this property returns the naming container at the top of the hierarchy, or <see langword="null" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> object is not in a naming container that implements <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 在實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer" /> 的命名容器階層架構中，這個屬性會傳回階層架構中最上層的命名容器，如果目前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> 物件不在實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer" /> 的命名容器中，則傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the naming container if the naming container implements <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataKeysControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果命名容器實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataKeysControl" />，則取得命名容器的參考。

trans-unit.source: The naming container.
trans-unit.target: 命名容器。

trans-unit.source: In a hierarchy of naming containers that implement <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataKeysControl" />, the property returns the naming container at the top of the hierarchy, or <see langword="null" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> object is not in a naming container that implements <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataKeysControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 在實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataKeysControl" /> 的命名容器階層架構中，這個屬性會傳回階層架構中最上層的命名容器，如果目前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> 物件不在實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataKeysControl" /> 的命名容器中，則會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a control is being used on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否正用於設計介面上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is being used in a designer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項正用於設計工具，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DesignMode%2A> property returns `true` to indicate that the control is being used in the context of a designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DesignMode%2A>屬性會傳回`true`表示控制項用於設計工具的內容。

trans-unit.source: Your custom controls can use this property when design-time behavior is different than run-time behavior.
trans-unit.target: 您的自訂控制項的設計階段行為不同於執行階段行為時，可以使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Enables a server control to perform final clean up before it is released from memory.
trans-unit.target: 啟用伺服器控制項，在它從記憶體釋放之前執行最後清除。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Dispose%2A> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Dispose%2A> 方法會將 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling this method, you must release all references to the control so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 之後呼叫這個方法，您必須釋放控制項的所有參考，讓它所佔用的記憶體可由記憶體回收收回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Dispose%2A> method to close the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> object associated with a control, and call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Dispose%2A> method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control, named `myButton`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Dispose%2A>方法，關閉<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>物件相關聯控制項，並呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Dispose%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制項，名為`myButton`。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Exception> is thrown when this version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Dispose%2A> method is called, the control writes a message to the current <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Exception>時擲回這個版本的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Dispose%2A>呼叫方法時，控制項將訊息寫入目前<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>物件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a server control is released from memory, which is the last stage of the server control lifecycle when an ASP.NET page is requested.
trans-unit.target: 發生於伺服器控制項從記憶體釋放時，這是在要求 ASP.NET 網頁時，伺服器控制項生命週期的最後階段。

trans-unit.source: Resources that require significant processor time, such as database connections, should be released with this event.
trans-unit.target: 需要大量的處理器時間，例如資料庫連接的資源釋出與這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出佈景主題是否套用至此控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use themes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示使用主題，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> property indicates whether themes are enabled for a specified control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A>屬性會指出是否啟用佈景主題，以供指定的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A>屬性是`true`，要套用的控制項面板會搜尋應用程式的佈景主題目錄。

trans-unit.source: If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果特定的控制項面板佈景主題目錄中，不會套用面板。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the content of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property is not used.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A>屬性是`false`，不會搜尋主題目錄和內容的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>屬性不使用。

trans-unit.source: Themes can be enabled at the page, container, or control level.
trans-unit.target: 佈景主題，可以在頁面、 容器或控制層級啟用。

trans-unit.source: A control can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> value set by its parent control, or by the containing page.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A>值由其父控制項，或包含網頁的設定。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Page_PreInit" /> event has already occurred.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Page_PreInit" /> 事件已發生。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The control has already been added to the <see langword="Controls" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 控制項已加入至 <see langword="Controls" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the server control persists its view state, and the view state of any child controls it contains, to the requesting client.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，該值表示伺服器控制項是否對要求的用戶端而言保持其檢視狀態，以及它包含的任何子控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the server control maintains its view state; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器控制項保持其檢視狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: View state enables a server control to maintain its state across HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 檢視狀態可讓伺服器控制項保持其狀態在 HTTP 要求。

trans-unit.source: View state for a control is enabled if all of the following conditions are met:
trans-unit.target: 控制項檢視狀態的已啟用，如果符合所有下列條件：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property for the page is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>頁面屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property for the control is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>控制項的屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property for the control is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled> or inherits the <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>控制項的屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>或繼承<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: A server control's view state is the accumulation of all its property values.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器控制項的檢視狀態是累積的所有屬性值。

trans-unit.source: In order to preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET uses an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class to store the property values.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留這些值在 HTTP 要求，ASP.NET 會使用的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>類別來儲存屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The values are then passed as a variable to a hidden field when subsequent requests are processed.
trans-unit.target: 值會再傳遞做為變數隱藏的欄位時，處理後續要求。

trans-unit.source: For more information about view state, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818).
trans-unit.target: 如需檢視狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 檢視狀態概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818)。

trans-unit.source: There are times when it is appropriate to disable view state, particularly to improve application performance.
trans-unit.target: 但有些的時候時則會適當地停用檢視狀態，尤其是為了改善應用程式效能。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are loading a database request into a server control, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您將資料庫要求載入伺服器控制項，再將此屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: If you do not, processor time will be wasted loading view state into the server control that will only be overridden by the database query.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，將檢視狀態載入伺服器控制項，將只會覆寫資料庫查詢浪費處理器時間。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> is `false`, you can use the control state to persist property information that is specific to a control and cannot be turned off like the view state property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>是`false`，您可以使用的控制項狀態，以保存是控制項專屬的而且無法關閉像檢視狀態屬性的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the difference between control state and view state, see [Control State vs. View State Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e98c7de-a888-48df-b14e-02ec8bef7681).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關控制狀態與檢視狀態之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱[vs 控制項狀態。檢視狀態範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e98c7de-a888-48df-b14e-02ec8bef7681)。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to enable or disable view state declaratively for an ASP.NET page, see .
trans-unit.target: 如需如何啟用或停用以宣告方式針對 ASP.NET 網頁的檢視狀態資訊，請參閱。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: The object that writes trace data.
trans-unit.target: 寫入追蹤資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The trace object.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤物件。

trans-unit.source: Ends design-time tracing of rendering data.
trans-unit.target: 結束轉譯資料的設計階段追蹤。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the server control contains child controls.
trans-unit.target: 判斷伺服器控制項是否包含子控制項。

trans-unit.source: If it does not, it creates child controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果不包含，則建立子控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method first checks the current value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會先檢查目前的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If this value is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值為`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureChildControls%2A> method is typically used in composite controls, which are controls that use child controls for some or all their functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureChildControls%2A>方法通常用於複合控制項，這是用於某些子控制項的控制項或它們的功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureChildControls%2A> method is called in order to make sure that child controls have been created and are ready to process input, to perform data binding, or to perform other tasks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureChildControls%2A>呼叫方法時若要確定已建立子控制項，並準備好處理輸入來執行資料繫結，或執行其他工作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is an example of a composite control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項是複合控制項的範例。

trans-unit.source: It creates child controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controls, which are used to render the HTML table that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> generates.
trans-unit.target: 它會建立子控制項例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控制項，這用來呈現 HTML 資料表，其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>產生。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, custom server control developers do not have to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，自訂的伺服器控制項開發人員並沒有覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If you do override this method, use it in a way similar to the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不要覆寫這個方法，則會使用預設的行為類似的方式。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureChildControls%2A> method to ensure that the current server control has child controls.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureChildControls%2A>方法，以確定目前的伺服器控制項的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: It then gets or sets a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.Text%2A> property for a child <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> Web control in the current server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 然後取得或設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.Text%2A>屬性之子系<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>Web 控制項中目前的伺服器控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Creates an identifier for controls that do not have an identifier assigned.
trans-unit.target: 為尚未指定識別項的控制項，建立識別項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureID%2A> method generates an identifier for controls that are contained in another control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureID%2A>方法會產生另一個控制項中的包含控制項的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Identifiers are generated only for controls that do not have a value assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別項僅針對沒有被指派一個值的控制項產生<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of event handler delegates for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項事件處理常式委派 (Delegate) 的清單。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The list of event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式委派的清單。

trans-unit.source: This property is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>, which uses a linear search algorithm to find entries in the list of delegates.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的型別是<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>，使用線性搜尋演算法來尋找項目清單中的委派。

trans-unit.source: A linear search algorithm is inefficient when working with a large number of entries.
trans-unit.target: 使用大量的項目時，線性搜尋演算法沒有效率。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you have a large list, finding entries with this property will be slow.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您有大型的清單，尋找具有此屬性的項目將會變慢。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an event, named `Click`, that adds and removes handlers from the control's <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList> collection when the event is called from a page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立事件時，名為`Click`，它加入，並從控制項移除處理常式<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>從網頁呼叫事件時的集合。

trans-unit.source: **Note** This example optimizes how a control adds and removes events from the list of them that the control maintains.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**本例最佳化方式控制項中加入和移除事件控制項維護這些設定的清單。

trans-unit.source: If you create custom control and want to define an event, use code similar to this.
trans-unit.target: 如果您建立自訂控制項，並想要定義事件，使用程式碼如下所示。

trans-unit.source: This technique can be used in C#, but not in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，但不是在 Visual Basic 中，可以使用這項技術。

trans-unit.source: Searches the current naming container for the specified server control.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的命名容器搜尋指定的伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the control to be found.
trans-unit.target: 所要尋找的控制項識別項。

trans-unit.source: Searches the current naming container for a server control with the specified <paramref name="id" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在目前命名容器搜尋具有指定 <paramref name="id" /> 參數的伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The specified control, or <see langword="null" /> if the specified control does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的控制項，如果指定的控制項不存在，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> to access a control from a function in a code-behind page, to access a control that is inside another container, or in other circumstances where the target control is not directly accessible to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>從函式在程式碼後置頁面中，若要存取另一個容器 （） 內的控制項，或在其他情況下，其中的目標控制項不是直接存取呼叫端存取控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method will find a control only if the control is directly contained by the specified container; that is, the method does not search throughout a hierarchy of controls within controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會找出控制項只有當控制項會直接包含在指定的容器。也就是此方法不會搜尋整個階層架構中控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to find a control when you do not know its immediate container, see [How to: Access Server Controls by ID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59964ef8-72ef-4159-9f1a-5b230ff46fb3).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何尋找控制項，當您不知道其直接容器資訊，請參閱[如何： 存取伺服器控制項的 ID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59964ef8-72ef-4159-9f1a-5b230ff46fb3)。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `Button1_Click` event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義`Button1_Click`事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When invoked, this handler uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method to locate a control with an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of `TextBox2` on the containing page.
trans-unit.target: 這個處理常式叫用時，會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法來找出與控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性`TextBox2`包含頁面上。

trans-unit.source: If the control is found, its parent is determined using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Parent%2A> property and the parent control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> is written to the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到控制項，其父代用來決定<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Parent%2A>屬性以及父控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>寫入頁面。

trans-unit.source: If `TextBox2` is not found, "Control Not Found" is written to the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果`TextBox2`找不到，「 找不到控制項"寫入頁面。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the control to be found.
trans-unit.target: 所要尋找的控制項識別項。

trans-unit.source: The number of controls up the page control hierarchy needed to reach a naming container.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面控制項階層架構中，向上到達命名容器所需的控制項數目。

trans-unit.source: Searches the current naming container for a server control with the specified <paramref name="id" /> and an integer, specified in the <paramref name="pathOffset" /> parameter, which aids in the search.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <paramref name="id" /> 和有助於搜尋之 <paramref name="pathOffset" /> 參數中所指定的整數，在目前的命名容器中搜尋伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: You should not override this version of the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該覆寫這個版本的 <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The specified control, or <see langword="null" /> if the specified control does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的控制項，如果指定的控制項不存在，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets input focus to a control.
trans-unit.target: 設定控制項的輸入焦點。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A> method to set the initial focus of the Web page to the control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A>方法，以設定網頁的初始焦點至控制項。

trans-unit.source: The page will be opened in the browser with the control selected.
trans-unit.target: 選取的控制項，將會在瀏覽器中開啟的網頁。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A> method causes a call to the page focus script to be emitted on the rendered page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A>方法會在轉譯頁面發出的頁面焦點指令碼的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If the page does not contain a control with an HTML `ID` attribute that matches the control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A> method was invoked on, then page focus will not be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果頁面未包含含有 HTML 控制項`ID`符合控制項的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A>方法叫用，則將不會設定頁面焦點。

trans-unit.source: An example where this can occur is when you set the focus on a user control instead of setting the focus on a child control of the user control.
trans-unit.target: 舉例來說，這種情況時，您將焦點設定在使用者控制項，而不是將焦點設定在使用者控制項的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method to find the child control of the user control and invoke its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法來尋找使用者控制項的子控制項，並叫用其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets design-time data for a control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的設計階段資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing the design-time data for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，包含控制項的設計階段資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.GetDesignModeState%2A> method returns design-time data for a control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.GetDesignModeState%2A>方法會傳回控制項的設計階段資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.GetDesignModeState" /> method returns <see langword="null" /> by default.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.GetDesignModeState" />方法會傳回<see langword="null" />預設。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method to provide the design-time data your control requires.
trans-unit.target: 您必須覆寫這個方法以提供控制項需要設計階段資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL that corresponds to a set of route parameters, and optionally to a route name.
trans-unit.target: 取得 URL，此 URL 對應於一組路由參數，而且會選擇性地對應到路由名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for coding convenience.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被提供給方便撰寫程式碼。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 路由參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL that corresponds to a set of route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 取得會對應於一組路由參數的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL that corresponds to the specified route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 對應於指定之路由參數的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for coding convenience.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被提供給方便撰寫程式碼。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method converts the object that is passed in `routeParameters` to a <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary> object by using the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary.%23ctor%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會將傳入的物件`routeParameters`至<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary>物件使用<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary.%23ctor%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.GetRouteUrl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to get the URL of a route that has parameters that are named `productid` and `category`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.GetRouteUrl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來取得名為參數的路由 URL`productid`和`category`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control that is named `HyperLink1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設您已建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項名為`HyperLink1`。

trans-unit.source: The route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 路由參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL that corresponds to a set of route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 取得會對應於一組路由參數的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL that corresponds to the specified route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 對應於指定之路由參數的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for coding convenience.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被提供給方便撰寫程式碼。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this method to get the URL of a route that has parameters that are named `productid` and `category`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何呼叫這個方法來取得名為參數的路由 URL`productid`和`category`。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設您已建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項名為`HyperLink1`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the route.
trans-unit.target: 路徑的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 路由參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL that corresponds to a set of route parameters and a route name.
trans-unit.target: 取得 URL，此 URL 對應於一組路由參數及一個路由名稱。

trans-unit.source: The URL that corresponds to the specified route parameters and route name.
trans-unit.target: 對應於指定之路由參數及路由名稱的 URL。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法被提供給方便撰寫程式碼。

trans-unit.target: 它相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method converts the object that is passed in `routeParameters` to a <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary> object by using the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary.%23ctor%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會將傳入的物件`routeParameters`至<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary>物件使用<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary.%23ctor%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this method to get the URL of a route that is named `Product` and has parameters that are named `productid` and `category`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何呼叫這個方法來取得名為的路由 URL`Product`且具有名為的參數`productid`和`category`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control that is named `HyperLink1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設您已建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項名為`HyperLink1`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the route.
trans-unit.target: 路徑的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 路由參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL that corresponds to a set of route parameters and a route name.
trans-unit.target: 取得 URL，此 URL 對應於一組路由參數及一個路由名稱。

trans-unit.source: The URL that corresponds to the specified route parameters and route name.
trans-unit.target: 對應於指定之路由參數及路由名稱的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for coding convenience.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被提供給方便撰寫程式碼。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this method to get the URL of a route that is named `Product` and has parameters that are named `productid` and `category`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何呼叫這個方法來取得名為的路由 URL`Product`且具有名為的參數`productid`和`category`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control that is named `HyperLink1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設您已建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項名為`HyperLink1`。

trans-unit.source: A control that is within a naming container.
trans-unit.target: 位在命名容器內的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Returns the prefixed portion of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID" /> property of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之控制項 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID" /> 屬性的前置部分。

trans-unit.source: The prefixed portion of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID" /> property of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 指定之控制項 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID" /> 屬性的前置部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> property of a control is generated by adding a prefix to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>控制項的屬性由前置詞加入至控制項的產生<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The prefix is composed of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> property of the control's naming container concatenated with a separator character.
trans-unit.target: 前置詞組成<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>控制項屬性的命名容器的分隔字元與串連。

trans-unit.source: If the naming container is the page, there is no prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果頁面命名的容器，沒有前置詞。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the prefix string.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回的前置詞字串。

trans-unit.source: If there is no prefix string, it returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有前置詞字串，它會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>控制項的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer" /> property of <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current server control's child controls have any saved view-state settings.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前伺服器控制項的子控制項是否有任何已儲存的檢視狀態設定。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if any child controls have saved view state information; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何子控制項有儲存的檢視狀態資訊，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can avoid unnecessary calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A> method by using this property to verify that any child controls of the server control are storing view-state information.
trans-unit.target: 您可以避免不必要的呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A>方法藉由使用這個屬性來驗證伺服器控制項的任何子控制項所儲存檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the server control contains any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 判斷伺服器控制項是否包含任何子控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control contains other controls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項包含其他控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Since this method simply determines if any child controls exist, it can enhance performance by allowing you to avoid an unnecessary <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A> property call.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個方法只會決定是否有任何子控制項，它還可以增強效能，可讓您避免不必要<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A>屬性呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Calls to this property require a <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object to be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個屬性需要<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>来具現化物件。

trans-unit.source: If there are no children, this object creation wastes server resources.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有子系，建立這個物件會浪費伺服器資源。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls%2A> method to determine if any controls exist before using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A> property to iterate through a <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls%2A>方法，以判斷任何控制項是否存在然後才使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A>屬性來逐一查看<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls" /> method should be overridden only to change metadata attributes such as <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls" />應該覆寫方法僅適用於變更中繼資料屬性，例如<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether events are registered for the control or any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出控制項或任何子控制項的事件是否已註冊。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if events are registered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已註冊，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the programmatic identifier assigned to the server control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指派給伺服器控制項的程式設計識別項。

trans-unit.source: The programmatic identifier assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: 指派給控制項的程式設計識別項。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property on a server control provides you with programmatic access to the server control's properties, events, and methods.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器控制項上設定這個屬性可以提供以程式設計方式存取伺服器控制項的屬性、 事件和方法。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set by Web developers by declaring an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> attribute in the opening tag of an ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 藉由宣告 Web 開發人員可以設定這個屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的開頭標記中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified for a server control, either declaratively or programmatically, you can obtain a reference to the control through its parent control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性未指定的伺服器控制項，以宣告方式或以程式設計方式，您可以取得透過其父控制項的控制項的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Only combinations of alphanumeric characters and the underscore character ( _ ) are valid values for this property.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的英數字元和底線字元 (_) 的組合是有效的值，這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Including spaces or other invalid characters will cause an ASP.NET page parser error.
trans-unit.target: 包含空格或其他無效的字元，會造成 ASP.NET 頁面剖析器錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets the character used to separate control identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來分隔控制項識別項的字元。

trans-unit.source: The separator character.
trans-unit.target: 分隔字元。

trans-unit.source: The default is "$".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 "$"。

trans-unit.source: The character contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IdSeparator%2A> property is used to separate the control identifiers for child controls.
trans-unit.target: 中所包含的字元<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IdSeparator%2A>屬性用來分隔的子控制項的控制項識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The ID separator character is appended to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 識別碼分隔字元附加至<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the server control is initialized, which is the first step in its lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: 發生於初始化伺服器控制項時，是其生命週期中的第一個步驟。

trans-unit.source: Server controls should perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器控制項應該執行建立及設定執行個體所需的任何初始化步驟。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use view-state information within this event; it is not populated yet.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用此事件; 內的檢視狀態資訊它不是尚未填入。

trans-unit.source: You should not access another server control during this event, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該在事件中，無論它是子系或父至此控制項存取另一個伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: 其他伺服器控制項不一定要建立並準備好進行存取。

trans-unit.source: For more information on server control events, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關伺服器控制項事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 伺服器控制項事件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3)。

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns a custom event handler, `Calendar_Init`, to the `Init` event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將指派的自訂事件處理常式`Calendar_Init`至`Init`事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether controls contained within this control have control state.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個控制項中所包含的控制項是否有控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if children of this control do not use control state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個控制項的子系不使用控制項狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the server control holds only literal content.
trans-unit.target: 判斷伺服器控制項是否只儲存常值內容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the server control contains solely literal content; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器控制項只含有常值內容，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns `true`, the server control's collection holds a single literal control.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回`true`，伺服器控制項的集合會保存單一常值的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks whether the page that contains the server controls has posted back.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查是否具有回傳所在的伺服器控制項的頁面。

trans-unit.source: If it has, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsLiteralContent%2A> method to determine whether the control contains just literal content, or is a parent control to other server controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，它會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsLiteralContent%2A>方法，以判斷控制項是否包含只要常值的內容，或為其他伺服器控制項的父控制項。

trans-unit.source: If it contains solely literal content, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> that represents that content is written to the response.
trans-unit.target: 如果它包含只常值內容<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>表示的內容寫入至回應。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the server control is saving changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出伺服器控制項是否正在儲存檢視狀態的變更。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is marked to save its state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果標記控制項以儲存其狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For a sample custom server control that uses this property, see [Templated Server Control Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/986f63b8-6b50-42b9-a62d-a2f13cafa88b)
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性的範例自訂的伺服器控制項，請參閱[樣板化的伺服器控制項範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/986f63b8-6b50-42b9-a62d-a2f13cafa88b)

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method in a custom ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項中的方法。

trans-unit.source: It begins by calling the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A> method and then uses the `ControlCollection` object.
trans-unit.target: 它一開始會藉由呼叫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A>方法，然後使用`ControlCollection`物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to delete all the child controls and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A> method to delete any saved view-state settings for those child controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 若要刪除所有子控制項的方法和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A>方法，以都刪除任何儲存的檢視狀態設定為這些子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The control then uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property to determine whether view-state change tracking is enabled for the control.
trans-unit.target: 然後使用控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>屬性來判斷是否啟用控制項的檢視狀態變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: If it is not enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果未啟用，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether view state is enabled for this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個控制項是否已啟用檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if view state is enabled for the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已啟用檢視狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: View state can be enabled at the page, container, or control level.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面、 容器或控制層級啟用檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: When view state is disabled at the page or container level, view state is disabled for all controls contained by the page or container.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面或容器層級停用檢視狀態時，網頁或容器所包含的所有控制項已停都用檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> property indicates whether view state is enabled by pages, containers, or controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>屬性會指出是否啟用檢視狀態的頁面、 容器或控制項。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> property to be different.
trans-unit.target: 可能會<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>屬性不同。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> containing the control has view state disabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property can be `true` while the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>包含控制項已停用，檢視狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性可以是`true`時<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>屬性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Page developers will set the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode" /> property to indicate whether they are using view state with your control.
trans-unit.target: 設定網頁開發人員將<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" />屬性和<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode" />屬性，指出它們是否都與您的控制項來使用檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode" /> property in your code to determine whether view state is enabled for your control and for all containers.
trans-unit.target: 使用<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled" />屬性和<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode" />在程式碼，以判斷是否已啟用檢視狀態，為您的控制項和所有容器中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the server control is loaded into the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 發生於載入伺服器控制項至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 物件時。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the server control to perform any processing steps that are set to occur on each page request.
trans-unit.target: 通知伺服器控制項執行設定為在每個頁面要求上進行任何處理步驟。

trans-unit.source: You can access view state information and Web form POST data from this event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從這個事件來存取檢視狀態資訊和 Web 表單張貼資料。

trans-unit.source: You can also access other server controls within the page's control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以存取頁面控制項階層架構內的其他伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you set a custom template in a control during the `Page_Load` event, the text values of child controls in the custom template will be lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定在控制項中的自訂範本`Page_Load`事件，自訂的範本中的子控制項的文字值將會遺失。

trans-unit.source: This occurs because the form values have already been loaded.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為已載入的表單值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，代表所要還原的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores control-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveControlState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveControlState" /> 方法所儲存的上一頁要求中，還原控制項狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Override this method when you need to specify how a custom server control restores its control state.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原它的控制項狀態時，覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState%2A> method in a custom ASP.NET control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState%2A>自訂 ASP.NET 控制項中的方法。

trans-unit.source: When this method is invoked, it determines whether control state was previously saved for the control and, if so, sets the internal property `currentIndex` to the saved value.
trans-unit.target: 叫用這個方法時，它會判斷是否控制項狀態先前儲存的控制項，則如果是的話，設定內部屬性`currentIndex`已儲存的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method is overridden to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A> to indicate that the custom control uses control state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>呼叫覆寫方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A>以指示自訂控制項使用控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，代表所要還原的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 將檢視狀態資訊從 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState" /> 方法所儲存的上一個網頁要求還原。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A> method for a custom ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A>自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的方法。

trans-unit.source: It creates an <xref:System.Object> array to contain the view state information passed in the `savedState` parameter, and then calls the base implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A> method for the first index location of the array.
trans-unit.target: 它會建立<xref:System.Object>陣列，包含傳入的檢視狀態資訊`savedState`參數，然後再呼叫的基底實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A>陣列的第一個索引位置的方法。

trans-unit.source: It assigns the values stored at the next two index locations to variables named `UserText` and `PasswordText`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 它會將儲存到名為的變數下, 面兩個索引位置的值指派`UserText`和`PasswordText`分別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control participates in loading its view state by <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> instead of index.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否依 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> (而不是索引) 參與載入其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control loads its view state by <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項依 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 載入其檢視狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, when a parent control loads view state into child controls it creates, it does this by the position of each child control in the parent control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，當父控制項檢視狀態載入子控制項，它會建立，其做法是父控制項中的每個子控制項位置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: When view state is initially applied, all child controls might not have been created.
trans-unit.target: 一開始套用檢視狀態時，所有子控制項可能尚未建立。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the view state for controls not yet created is saved, and applied when the child controls are created later.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，尚未建立的控制項檢視狀態儲存，並套用更新版本建立的子控制項時。

trans-unit.source: For a parent control to apply view state to its child controls, two conditions must be met:
trans-unit.target: 要套用至它的子控制項的 檢視狀態的父控制項，必須符合兩個條件：

trans-unit.source: On postback, the parent control must create the child controls in exactly the same order as the previous request so that the order of the controls remains consistent.
trans-unit.target: 在回傳時，父控制項必須建立子控制項中前一個要求完全相同的順序，讓控制項的順序會維持一致。

trans-unit.source: After postback, any child controls created must be added to the end of the parent control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 在回傳後, 建立的任何子控制項必須加入至父控制項的結尾<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If these two conditions cannot be met, as in the case of the delayed creation of a child control, the parent control can load view state by using <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不符合這兩項條件，如果是延遲的建立子控制項，父控制項可以使用載入檢視狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A> property to `true`, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateModeByIdAttribute> metadata attribute for the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A>屬性`true`，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateModeByIdAttribute>父控制項的中繼資料屬性。

trans-unit.source: A relative or root relative URL.
trans-unit.target: 相對的或根相對路徑的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the physical path that a virtual path, either absolute or relative, maps to.
trans-unit.target: 擷取虛擬絕對路徑或相對路徑所對應至的實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: The physical path to the requested file.
trans-unit.target: 所要求檔案的實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: This method can only be used by server controls that have permissions to read files and which are part of fully trusted .dll files, such as System.Web.dll.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅能有讀取檔案的權限和哪些是完全受信任的.dll 檔案，例如 System.Web.dll 一部分的伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: This helps prevent security breaches.
trans-unit.target: 這有助於防止安全性漏洞。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.MapPathSecure%2A> method to obtain the physical path of a virtual directory of the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> or <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.MapPathSecure%2A>方法，以取得包含虛擬目錄的實體路徑<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>或<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the server control's naming container, which creates a unique namespace for differentiating between server controls with the same <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: 取得伺服器控制項命名容器的參考，其建立唯一命名空間，在具有相同 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 屬性值的伺服器控制項之間作區別。

trans-unit.source: The server control's naming container.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器控制項的命名容器。

trans-unit.source: Each page in an ASP.NET Web application contains a hierarchy of controls.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Web 應用程式中的每個頁面包含控制項階層的架構。

trans-unit.source: This hierarchy is not dependent on whether a control generates UI visible to the user.
trans-unit.target: 此階層不會隨著控制項是否產生 UI 使用者可見的。

trans-unit.source: The naming container for a given control is the parent control above it in the hierarchy that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 指定控制項的命名容器是實作在階層中的其上方父控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>介面。

trans-unit.source: A server control that implements this interface creates a unique namespace for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property values of its child server controls.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器控制項實作此介面會建立唯一的命名空間的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>子伺服器控制項的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> property of a naming container's child control to get a reference to its parent container.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>屬性命名的容器子控制項，以取得其父容器的參考。

trans-unit.source: Creating a unique namespace for server controls is particularly important when you bind Web server controls to data, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> server controls.
trans-unit.target: 當您繫結的 Web 伺服器控制項的資料，例如建立伺服器控制項的唯一命名空間是特別重要<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: When multiple entries in the data source create multiple instances of a server control that is a child of the repeating control, the naming container ensures that each instance of these child controls have <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> property values that do not conflict.
trans-unit.target: 當資料來源中的多個項目建立多個重複的控制項的子系的伺服器控制項執行個體時，可確保命名容器的這些子控制項的每個執行個體有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>不衝突的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The default naming container for a page is the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class that is generated when that page is requested.
trans-unit.target: 頁面的預設命名容器是的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>該頁面的要求時，會產生的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> property contains the value that is rendered as the element's `id` attribute in the HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>屬性包含的值，會轉譯為元素的`id`屬性的 HTML 標記中。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value that you assign to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> property, the value that is generated for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> property might include the ID of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> object.
