trans-unit.target: 根據您指派給值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>屬性、 值所產生的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>屬性可能包括識別碼<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>物件。

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> to <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Static>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value does not include the ID of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>至<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Static>、<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>值不包含 ID<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>物件。

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> to either <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.AutoID> or <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value will include the ID from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>為<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.AutoID>或<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable>、<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>值將會包含來自識別碼<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [ASP.NET 網頁伺服器控制項識別](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the server control is passed up the page's UI server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 決定伺服器控制項的事件是否要在頁面的 UI 伺服器控制項階層架構中向上傳遞。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已取消，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET server controls such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> Web controls can contain child controls that raise events.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>Web 控制項可以包含引發事件的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, each row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can contain one or more buttons created dynamically by templates.
trans-unit.target: 例如，每個資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項可以包含一或多個動態範本所建立的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are "bubbled"—that is, they are sent to the naming container.
trans-unit.target: 而不是每個按鈕分別引發事件，讓巢狀控制項的事件 」 反昇"— 也就是傳送到此命名容器。

trans-unit.source: The naming container in turn raises a generic event called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> with parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 依次命名容器引發的一般事件呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>使用的參數值。

trans-unit.source: These values allow you to determine which individual control that raised the original event.
trans-unit.target: 這些值可以讓您判斷哪一個個別控制項引發原始事件。

trans-unit.source: By responding to this single event, you can avoid having to write individual event-handling methods for child controls.
trans-unit.target: 利用這個單一事件有回應，您可以不必撰寫個別子控制項的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A> method in a custom ASP.NET server control, `ParentControl`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A>自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，方法`ParentControl`。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked when a child control of `ParentControl` calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用時的子控制項`ParentControl`呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When this happens, the `ParentControl` class writes two strings to the containing ASP.NET page, the first stating that its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A> method has been called, the second identifying the source control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當發生這種情況時，`ParentControl`類別寫入包含 ASP.NET 網頁，第一個說明中的兩個字串，其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A>已呼叫方法，第二個識別的原始檔控制<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method notifies a server control to perform any logic for binding data that is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會通知伺服器控制項，以執行任何的邏輯與它相關聯的資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: If you want to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event, you should override this event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要處理<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>事件，您應該覆寫這個事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that all delegates attached to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event are invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保所有的委派附加至<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>叫用事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A> method to add child controls to the parent control from a data source.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A>方法，以從資料來源加入至父控制項的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會呼叫這個方法，引發<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing a custom control, you can override this method in order to provide additional processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在開發的自訂控制項，您可以覆寫這個方法以提供額外的處理。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, call the base control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method to notify subscribers to the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，呼叫基底控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>方法來通知事件的訂閱者。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會呼叫這個方法，引發<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing a custom control, you can override this method in order to provide additional processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在開發的自訂控制項，您可以覆寫這個方法以提供額外的處理。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, call the base control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad%2A> method to notify subscribers to the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，呼叫基底控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad%2A>方法來通知事件的訂閱者。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會呼叫這個方法，引發<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing a custom control, you can override this method in order to provide additional processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在開發的自訂控制項，您可以覆寫這個方法以提供額外的處理。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, call the base control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method to notify subscribers to the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，呼叫基底控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>方法來通知事件的訂閱者。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 物件，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload> event.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會呼叫這個方法，引發<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing a custom control, you can override this method in order to provide additional processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在開發的自訂控制項，您可以覆寫這個方法以提供額外的處理。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, call the base control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnUnload%2A> method to notify subscribers to the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，呼叫基底控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnUnload%2A>方法來通知事件的訂閱者。

trans-unit.source: The path to the desired file.
trans-unit.target: 所需要之檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> used to read a file.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來讀取檔案的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that references the desired file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，參考所需要的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OpenFile%2A> method returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object that can be used to read the contents of the file specified in the `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OpenFile%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.IO.Stream>物件可以用來讀取檔案中指定的內容，`path`參數。

trans-unit.source: The path parameter can be either a relative or root URL without a protocol (such as "~/mySite/myFile.txt), or a physical path, either local ("c:\mySite\myFile.txt") or UNC ("\\\myServer\myFile.txt").
trans-unit.target: Path 參數可以是相對或根目錄 URL 通訊協定不 (例如"~ / mySite/myFile.txt)，或實體的路徑，本機 (「 c:\mySite\myFile.txt") 或 UNC (「\\\myServer\myFile.txt")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OpenFile%2A> method uses file access security to control access to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OpenFile%2A>方法會使用檔案存取安全性來控制存取指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the current ASP.NET user does not have access to the file, then the file is not opened and an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown to indicate that access was denied.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的 ASP.NET 使用者並沒有存取檔案，然後無法開啟檔案和<xref:System.Web.HttpException>擲回例外狀況，表示存取被拒。

trans-unit.source: If the `path` parameter specified a relative path, the exception does not include information about the physical path to the requested file.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`參數指定為相對路徑，例外狀況不包含要求的檔案的實體路徑的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Access to the specified file was denied.
trans-unit.target: 存取指定的檔案遭拒絕。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance that contains the server control.
trans-unit.target: 取得含有伺服器控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 執行個體的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance that contains the server control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 執行個體，包含伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property's value reflects the name of the .aspx file that contains the server control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會反映在含有伺服器控制項的.aspx 檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會覆寫 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法。

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> property to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and determine whether the page that contains this control has just been loaded for the first time or is the result of a postback.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>屬性來存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性並判斷是否包含此控制項的頁面就已載入第一次，或已回傳的結果。

trans-unit.source: The control is a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the server control's parent control in the page control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在網頁控制階層架構中取得伺服器控制項之父控制項的參考。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the server control's parent control.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器控制項父控制項的參考。

trans-unit.source: Whenever a page is requested, a hierarchy of server controls on that page is built.
trans-unit.target: 每當要求頁面時，是建置在該頁面上的伺服器控制項階層架構。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to determine the parent control of the current server control in that hierarchy, and to program against it.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您判斷在該階層中，並針對它的程式目前伺服器控制項的父控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets a new <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object on a page, `myControl1`, to the control specified in a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定新<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>物件在頁面上， `myControl1`，在指定的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If the call returns a control, the code uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Parent%2A> property to identify the control that contains `myControl1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫傳回的控制項，程式碼會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Parent%2A>屬性來識別包含的控制項`myControl1`。

trans-unit.source: If the parent control exists, the string "The parent of the text box is" is concatenated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the parent control and written to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果父控制項存在，字串"文字方塊的父 is"就會與串連<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>父控制項的屬性和寫入<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If no parent control is found, the string "Control not found" is written.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到任何父控制項，字串"控制項找不到 」 會寫入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> object is loaded but prior to rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> 物件載入之後但在呈現之前發生。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform any updates before the server control is rendered to the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件之前頁面呈現伺服器控制項，執行任何更新。

trans-unit.source: Any changes in the view state of the server control can be saved during this event.
trans-unit.target: 在此事件期間，可以儲存伺服器控制項的檢視狀態中的任何變更。

trans-unit.source: Such changes made in the rendering phase will not be saved.
trans-unit.target: 這類在轉譯階段所做的變更將不會儲存。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Assigns any sources of the event and its information to the control's parent.
trans-unit.target: 指派事件的任何來源和它的資訊至控制項的父控制項。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET server controls such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> Web controls can contain child controls that raise events.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>Web 控制項可以包含引發事件的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, each row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can contain one or more buttons created dynamically by templates.
trans-unit.target: 例如，每個資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項可以包含一或多個動態範本所建立的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are "bubbled"—that is, they are sent to the control's parent.
trans-unit.target: 而不是每個按鈕分別引發事件，讓巢狀控制項的事件 」 反昇"— 也就是會傳送至控制項的父代。

trans-unit.source: The parent in turn raises a generic event called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> with parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 父又會引發呼叫泛型事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>使用的參數值。

trans-unit.source: These values allow you to determine which individual control that raised the original event.
trans-unit.target: 這些值可以讓您判斷哪一個個別控制項引發原始事件。

trans-unit.source: By responding to this single event, you can avoid having to write individual event-handling methods for child controls.
trans-unit.target: 利用這個單一事件有回應，您可以不必撰寫個別子控制項的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: While you cannot override this method, controls you author can handle or raise bubbled events by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您無法覆寫這個方法，可以處理您撰寫的控制項，或藉由覆寫引發事件反昇<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrate how to create a custom class, `ChildControl`, overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.OnClick%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A> method that sends the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to its parent ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂的類別， `ChildControl`，覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.OnClick%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A>方法傳送<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click?displayProperty=nameWithType>至其父代 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的事件。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks a button in an ASP.NET page that includes an instance of `ChildControl`, it raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A> method on the parent control that contains the instance of `ChildControl` and writes the string "The ChildControl class OnClick method is called" to the page.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下按鈕，以在 ASP.NET 網頁，其中包含的執行個體`ChildControl`，便會產生<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A>方法上包含的執行個體的父控制項`ChildControl`，並將字串寫入"ChildControl 類別 OnClick 方法呼叫 」 頁面。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> that has been removed.
trans-unit.target: 已移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: Called after a child control is removed from the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> collection of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> 物件的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> 集合中移除子控制項之後呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RemovedControl%2A> method is called immediately after a control is removed from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RemovedControl%2A>方法從移除控制項之後，立即呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The control is a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object that receives the server control content.
trans-unit.target: 接收伺服器控制項內容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Sends server control content to a provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object, which writes the content to be rendered on the client.
trans-unit.target: 將伺服器控制項內容傳送到提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件，以寫入要在用戶端上呈現的內容。

trans-unit.source: When developing custom server controls, you can override this method to generate content for an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 在開發自訂的伺服器控制項，您可以覆寫這個方法來產生 ASP.NET 網頁的內容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls%2A> method is used to determine whether the server control has any child controls stored in its <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object, which is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls%2A>方法用來決定伺服器控制項是否有任何子控制項，儲存在其<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>物件，可透過存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls%2A> returns true and the first server control in the collection is literal text, then the literal text is appended to an HTML string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls%2A>傳回 true，且集合中的第一個伺服器控制項是常值文字，則常值文字會附加至 HTML 字串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: 接收所呈現內容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Outputs the content of a server control's children to a provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object, which writes the content to be rendered on the client.
trans-unit.target: 輸出伺服器控制項之子控制項的內容至提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件，這個物件會寫入用戶端上所要呈現的內容。

trans-unit.source: This method notifies ASP.NET to render any Active Server Pages (ASP) code on the page.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會通知 ASP.NET 轉譯頁面上的任何 Active Server Pages (ASP) 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: If no ASP code exists on the page, this method renders any child controls for the server control.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有 ASP 程式碼存在於頁面上，這個方法會呈現任何子伺服器控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> method in a custom server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>自訂的伺服器控制項中的方法。

trans-unit.source: It determines whether the current control has any child controls in its <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 它會判斷目前的控制項是否有任何子控制項，其<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: If it does, it uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A> property to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果是的話，它會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A>來逐一查看集合的屬性。

trans-unit.source: As it encounters each child control, it uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl%2A> method to render the parent control, and all of its child controls, to the containing page.
trans-unit.target: 當它遇到每個子控制項，它會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl%2A>方法以呈現控制項和所有子控制項，以包含頁面的父系。

trans-unit.source: The overridden <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A> method then calls the overridden <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A>方法接著呼叫覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Outputs server control content and stores tracing information about the control if tracing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 輸出伺服器控制項內容，並在啟用追蹤功能的情況下，儲存有關控制項的追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object that receives the control content.
trans-unit.target: 接收控制項內容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Outputs server control content to a provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object and stores tracing information about the control if tracing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 將伺服器控制項內容輸出至提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件，並在啟用追蹤時儲存控制項的追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: If a server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property is set to `true`, this method determines whether tracing is enabled for the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>屬性設定為`true`，這個方法會判斷頁面是否已啟用追蹤。

trans-unit.source: If so, it stores trace information associated with the control, and renders the server control content to the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果是的話，它會儲存與控制項相關聯的追蹤資訊，並呈現伺服器控制項內容至頁面。

trans-unit.source: This method is automatically called by the page during the rendering, but can be overridden by custom control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會自動呼叫網頁呈現期間，但可覆寫自訂控制項開發人員。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> method in a custom server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>自訂的伺服器控制項中的方法。

trans-unit.source: It determines whether the current control has any child controls in its <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 它會判斷目前的控制項是否有任何子控制項，其<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: If it does, it uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A> property to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果是的話，它會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A>來逐一查看集合的屬性。

trans-unit.source: As it encounters each child control, it uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl%2A> method to render the child control, and all of its child controls, to the containing page.
trans-unit.target: 當它遇到每個子控制項，它會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl%2A>來呈現子控制項，及其所有子控制項，以包含頁面的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter> object that is passed to this method is instantiated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Render%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter>傳遞給這個方法的物件具現化所<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Render%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the control content.
trans-unit.target: 接收控制項內容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter" /> that defines the rendering.
trans-unit.target: 定義呈現的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter" />。

trans-unit.source: Outputs server control content to a provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object using a provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件，輸出伺服器控制項內容至提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Web pages are usable across a wide range of devices and browsers that can request information from the Web.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Web pages 可跨越各種不同的裝置和瀏覽器，可以從網站要求資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter> object that renders the control on the requesting device or browser's screen.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>提出要求的裝置或瀏覽器的螢幕呈現控制項的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about adapters, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).
trans-unit.target: 如需配接器的詳細資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。

trans-unit.source: If a server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property is set to `true` and tracing is enabled for the page, then trace information associated with the control is captured.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>屬性設定為`true`和頁面上，啟用追蹤，則會擷取與控制項關聯的追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter,System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter)" /> method in custom controls, call the base class method to ensure trace information is correctly captured.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter,System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter)" />中自訂控制項，方法呼叫基底類別方法，以確保正確擷取追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies the ASP.NET version that rendered HTML will be compatible with.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會指定將與呈現 HTML 相容的 ASP.NET 版本。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET version that rendered HTML will be compatible with.
trans-unit.target: 將與呈現 HTML 相容的 ASP.NET 版本。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET sets this property to the value of the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the `pages` element in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 設定這個屬性的值`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`屬性`pages`Web.config 檔案中的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute is not set in the Web.config file, the default value is the current version of ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 如果`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`屬性未設定 Web.config 檔案中，預設值是目前版本的 ASP.NET。

trans-unit.source: There is a public set accessor for this property, but the set accessor supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 沒有公用的 set 存取子為此屬性，但 set 存取子支援.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: If you set this value in your code, the effect is unpredictable.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在程式碼中設定這個值，結果是無法預期。

trans-unit.source: Each release of ASP.NET might render HTML differently from earlier releases.
trans-unit.target: 每個版本的 ASP.NET 可能會以不同的方式呈現 HTML，從較早的版本。

trans-unit.source: For example, in ASP.NET 3.5, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control is `false`, by default, ASP.NET renders a `span` element whose `disabled` attribute is set to "disabled".
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 ASP.NET 3.5 中，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項是`false`，根據預設，ASP.NET 會呈現`span`項目其`disabled`屬性設為"disabled"。

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET 4, by default, the `span` element is rendered with a cascading style sheet (CSS) `class` attribute instead of the `disabled` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 4 中，依預設，`span`項目以階層式樣式表 (CSS) 來呈現`class`屬性，而非`disabled`屬性。

trans-unit.source: This lets you specify the disabled appearance of the control and avoids rendering invalid HTML.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您指定控制項的停用的外觀，並避免無效 HTML 呈現。

trans-unit.source: (In HTML 4.0 and XHTML 1.1, the `span` element does not support the `disabled` attribute.)
trans-unit.target: (在 HTML 4.0 和 XHTML 1.1`span`元素不支援`disabled`屬性。)

trans-unit.source: A Web application might include code that would not function correctly if HTML rendering changes.
trans-unit.target: Web 應用程式可能包含會無法正確運作如果 HTML 轉譯變更的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, you can set the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the `pages` element in the Web.config file to indicate which earlier version you want to maintain compatibility with.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，您可以設定`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`屬性`pages`Web.config 檔案，以指出您想要維護與相容性的先前版本中的項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property to `3.5`, a disabled <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control will render a `disabled` attribute and not a CSS class.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>屬性`3.5`，已停用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項將會呈現`disabled`屬性而不是 CSS 類別。

trans-unit.source: The earliest version that you can set this property to is `3.5`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將此屬性的最早版本是`3.5`。

trans-unit.source: To maintain backward compatibility, when you use Visual Studio to upgrade a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute in the Web.config file to `3.5`.
trans-unit.target: 為了與舊版相容，當您使用 Visual Studio Web 專案升級至 ASP.NET 4，從較早版本時，Visual Studio 會自動設定`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`Web.config 檔案中的屬性`3.5`。

trans-unit.source: If you want an upgraded Web site to render HTML using the algorithm that was introduced in ASP.NET 4, you can change or remove the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要呈現使用 ASP.NET 4 中推出了演算法 HTML 升級的網站時，您可以變更或移除`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`屬性。

trans-unit.source: Most of the time, the behavior controlled by this property is automatic and you do not have to check the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property in your code.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的情況下，由這個屬性所控制的行為是自動，而且您沒有檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>程式碼中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, if you are programming a custom control, you might have to include code that alters the control's behavior based on the setting of this property.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您撰寫自訂控制項，您可能必須包含程式碼，此屬性設定為基礎的控制項的行為會改變。

trans-unit.source: For example, a custom control for ASP.NET 4 might be composed of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controls, and the custom control might specify the disabled appearance of the control by generating JavaScript code that alters the `aspNetDisabled` class.
trans-unit.target: 例如，針對 ASP.NET 4 的自訂控制項可能會組成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項，以及自訂控制項可能會產生改變的 JavaScript 程式碼來指定已停用控制項的外觀`aspNetDisabled`類別。

trans-unit.source: This will work as expected if <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> is `4.0` or later.
trans-unit.target: 這將如預期運作<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>是`4.0`或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: But to get the same effect when <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> is `3.5`, the custom control's code must set the control's `CssClass` property to "aspNetDisabled" when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 但若要取得相同作用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>是`3.5`，自訂控制項的程式碼必須設定控制項的`CssClass`"aspNetDisabled"的屬性時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>屬性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control adapter responsible for rendering the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 取得負責呈現指定之控制項的控制項配置器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter" /> that will render the control.
trans-unit.target: 負責呈現控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter" />。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Web pages are viewable across a wide range of devices that are capable of requesting pages from the Web.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Web pages 皆可檢視跨越各種裝置從 Web 要求頁面的不同。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveAdapter%2A> method returns the control adapter responsible for rendering the control on the specific browser or device that requested the ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveAdapter%2A>方法會傳回控制項配接器負責呈現控制項的特定瀏覽器或裝置上要求的 ASP.NET 網頁。

trans-unit.source: The specific adapter type returned depends on the descendent type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class that is being rendered.
trans-unit.target: 傳回特定配接器類型的子系的類型而定<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>所呈現的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about adapters, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).
trans-unit.target: 如需配接器的詳細資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。

trans-unit.source: A URL relative to the current page.
trans-unit.target: 相對於目前頁面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets a URL that can be used by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器可使用的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A fully qualified URL to the specified resource suitable for use on the browser.
trans-unit.target: 適合瀏覽器使用、指定之資源的完整 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A> method to return a URL string suitable for use by the client to access resources on the Web server, such as image files, links to additional pages, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A>方法以傳回 URL 字串適用於用戶端存取資源的 Web 伺服器上，例如影像檔連結至其他頁面，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The URL returned by this method is relative to the folder containing the source file in which the control is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所傳回的 URL 是相對於包含控制項具現化的原始程式檔的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Controls that inherit this property, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>, will return a fully qualified URL relative to the control.
trans-unit.target: 繼承這個屬性，例如控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>，將會傳回相對於控制項的完整的 URL。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="relativeUrl" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="relativeUrl" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The URL associated with the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory" /> 屬性關聯的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Converts a URL into one that is usable on the requesting client.
trans-unit.target: 將 URL 轉換為要求用戶端可使用的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The converted URL.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換的 URL。

trans-unit.source: If the `relativeUrl` parameter contains an absolute URL, the URL is returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果`relativeUrl`參數包含絕對 URL，URL 會原封不動地傳回。

trans-unit.source: If the `relativeUrl` parameter contains a relative URL, that URL is changed to a relative URL that is correct for the current request path, so that the browser can resolve the URL.
trans-unit.target: 如果`relativeUrl`參數包含相對 URL，URL 會變更為正確無誤目前要求路徑中，以便解決瀏覽器 URL 的相對 URL。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider the following scenario:
trans-unit.target: 例如，請考慮下列案例：

trans-unit.source: A client has requested an ASP.NET page that contains a user control that has an image associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端已要求包含具有與它相關聯的映像的使用者控制項的 ASP.NET 網頁。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page is located at /Store/page1.aspx.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 網頁位於 /Store/page1.aspx。

trans-unit.source: The user control is located at /Store/UserControls/UC1.ascx.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項是位於 /Store/UserControls/UC1.ascx。

trans-unit.source: The image file is located at /UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg.
trans-unit.target: 位於 /UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg 映像檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the user control passes the relative path to the image (that is, /Store/UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg) to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveUrl%2A> method, the method will return the value /Images/Image1.jpg.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者控制項將映像 (也就是 /Store/UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg) 的相對路徑傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveUrl%2A>方法，則方法會傳回值 /Images/Image1.jpg。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property to resolve to the absolute URL.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A>屬性來解析為絕對 URL。

trans-unit.source: The returned URL is for client use.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 URL 是供用戶端使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information on resource paths in a Web site, see [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關在網站上的資源路徑的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web 專案路徑](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd)。

trans-unit.source: For mobile Web pages only, if your application relies on cookieless sessions or might receive requests from mobile browsers that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde ("~") in a path can result in inadvertently creating a new session and potentially losing session data.
trans-unit.target: 僅適用行動 Web 網頁，如果您的應用程式依賴無 cookie 工作階段，或可能會收到要求，從行動瀏覽器需要無 cookie 工作階段，使用波狀符號 ("~ 」) 之路徑中可能會導致不小心建立新的工作階段，也可能遺失工作階段資料。

trans-unit.source: To set a property with a path such as "~/*path"*, resolve the path by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A> with an argument such as "~/*path"* before assigning it to the property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定路徑的屬性，例如"~ /*路徑 」*，藉由呼叫解析路徑<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A>的引數，例如"~ /*路徑"*之前指派給屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> Web server control object and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveUrl%2A> method to set the path to the image, which is stored by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>Web 伺服器控制項物件，並使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveUrl%2A>方法來設定路徑的映像會儲存為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="relativeUrl" /> parameter contains <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <paramref name="relativeUrl" /> 參數包含 <see langword="null" /> 的情況。

trans-unit.source: Saves any server control state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存頁面回傳至伺服器以來，所發生的任何伺服器控制項狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current state.
trans-unit.target: 傳回伺服器控制項目前的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If there is no state associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有與控制項關聯的狀態，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveControlState%2A> method to save state information required for the operation of a specific control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveControlState%2A>方法來儲存所需的特定控制項的作業的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: This control-state data is stored separately from the control's view-state data.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的檢視狀態資料分開儲存此控制項狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: Custom controls using control state must call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A> before saving control state.
trans-unit.target: 使用控制項狀態的自訂控制項必須呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A>之前儲存控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveControlState%2A> method in a custom ASP.NET control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveControlState%2A>自訂 ASP.NET 控制項中的方法。

trans-unit.source: When this method is invoked, it determines whether the internal property `currentIndex` is set to a non-default value and, if so, saves the value to control state.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法會叫用時，它會判斷是否內部屬性`currentIndex`設定為非預設值，而且如果是的話，會將值儲存控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method is overridden to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A> to indicate that the custom control uses control state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>呼叫覆寫方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A>以指示自訂控制項使用控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: When control state is saved, a string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML <see langword="HIDDEN" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 字串物件儲存控制狀態時，會為儲存在 HTML 中的變數傳回給用戶端<see langword="HIDDEN" />項目。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to extract the state information to use in your control.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法來擷取控制項中使用的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Control state is intended for small amounts of critical data, such as a page index or a keyword.
trans-unit.target: 控制項狀態適用於小量的重要資料，例如頁面索引或關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: Using control state for large amounts of data can adversely affect page performance.
trans-unit.target: 使用大量資料的控制項狀態頁面效能造成不良的影響。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: Saves any server control view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來所發生的任何伺服器控制項檢視狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 傳回伺服器控制項的目前檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有與控制項相關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>屬性，這是執行個體的<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>類別。

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 網頁生命週期概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `HIDDEN` element.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串物件儲存檢視狀態時，會為儲存在 HTML 中的變數傳回給用戶端`HIDDEN`項目。

trans-unit.source: When you author a custom server control with a custom view state, the view state can be managed explicitly with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 當您撰寫自訂的檢視狀態的自訂伺服器控制項時，檢視狀態可以明確地透過管理<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: For information on implementing a custom session-state provider, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).
trans-unit.target: 如需實作自訂的工作階段狀態提供者資訊，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A> method in a custom ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A>自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項中的方法。

trans-unit.source: When this method is invoked, it determines whether the control has any child controls and whether the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object is the result of a postback.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法會叫用時，它會判斷控制項是否有任何子控制項，以及是否包含<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>物件是回傳的結果。

trans-unit.source: If both are true, it changes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> Web server control to read `Custom Control Has Saved State`.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩者都為 true，它會變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>Web 伺服器控制項，讀取`Custom Control Has Saved State`。

trans-unit.source: It then saves the view state of the control as an array of objects, named `allStates`.
trans-unit.target: 然後將控制項的檢視狀態儲存為陣列的物件，名為`allStates`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing the design-time data for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，包含控制項的設計階段資料。

trans-unit.source: Sets design-time data for a control.
trans-unit.target: 設定控制項的設計階段資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SetDesignModeState%2A> method saves design-time data for a control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SetDesignModeState%2A>方法會將儲存控制項的設計階段資料。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method to save the design-time data your control requires.
trans-unit.target: 您必須覆寫這個方法，以儲存您的控制項需要設計階段資料。

trans-unit.source: The information necessary to pass to the delegate so that it can render the server control.
trans-unit.target: 要傳給委派的必要資訊，使委派呈現伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Assigns an event handler delegate to render the server control and its content into its parent control.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件處理常式委派，以呈現伺服器控制項及其內容至其父控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is supplied for implementation purposes only; you should never call it directly.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法提供實作之用;您應該永遠不會呼叫它直接。

trans-unit.source: Sets trace data for design-time tracing of rendering data.
trans-unit.target: 設定設計階段期間追蹤產生資料的追蹤資料。

trans-unit.source: The trace data key.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤資料索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The trace data value.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤資料值。

trans-unit.source: Sets trace data for design-time tracing of rendering data, using the trace data key and the trace data value.
trans-unit.target: 使用追蹤資料機碼和追蹤資料值，設定設計階段期間追蹤呈現資料的追蹤資料。

trans-unit.source: The traced object.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤的物件。

trans-unit.source: The trace data key.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤資料索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The trace data value.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤資料值。

trans-unit.source: Sets trace data for design-time tracing of rendering data, using the traced object, the trace data key, and the trace data value.
trans-unit.target: 使用追蹤的物體、追蹤資料機碼和追蹤資料值，設定設計階段期間追蹤呈現資料的追蹤資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the container that hosts the current control when rendered on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: 當呈現在設計介面上時，取得裝載目前控制項之容器的資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> that contains information about the container that the control is hosted in.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" />，包含裝載控制項之容器的資訊。

trans-unit.source: A site binds a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> object to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> object and enables communication between the two.
trans-unit.target: 站台繫結<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>物件，並允許兩者之間的通訊。

trans-unit.source: It also provides a way for the container to manage its components.
trans-unit.target: 它也提供方法，讓管理其元件的容器。

trans-unit.source: The control is a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the skin to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要套用至控制項的面板。

trans-unit.source: The name of the skin to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至控制項之面板的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Skins available to a control are contained in one or more skin files in a theme directory.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可以使用的面板包含一或多個主題目錄中的面板檔案中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property specifies which of these skins to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>屬性會指定哪個這些要套用至控制項的面板。

trans-unit.source: A skin is specific to a particular control; you cannot share skin settings between controls of different types.
trans-unit.target: 面板是控制項專屬的特定;您無法共用不同類型的控制項之間的外觀設定。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property, a control uses the default skin if one is defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>屬性，控制使用的預設面板有已定義。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a skin without an ID is defined for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control, then that skin applies to all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> controls that do not explicitly reference a skin by ID and that are not set to disable themes.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果沒有面板識別碼定義為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制，則該面板適用於所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制項，未明確參考識別碼的外觀和，未設定為停用主題。

trans-unit.source: If a skin with an ID is defined for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control, then that skin applies only to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> controls whose <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property is set to that ID.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義識別碼面板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制，則該面板只會套用到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>屬性設定為該識別碼。

trans-unit.source: If the skin files in a theme directory do not contain a skin with the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown at run time.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the template that contains this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含了此控制項之樣板的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" /> instance that contains this control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" /> 執行個體，包含這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> instance is part of a control template, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateControl%2A> property contains a reference to the containing control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>控制項樣板的執行個體屬於<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateControl%2A>屬性包含包含控制項的參考。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl?displayProperty=nameWithType> documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl?displayProperty=nameWithType>文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the virtual directory of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> or <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UserControl" /> that contains the current server control.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含目前伺服器控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UserControl" /> 的虛擬目錄。

trans-unit.source: The virtual directory of the page or user control that contains the server control.
trans-unit.target: 網頁或使用者控制項的虛擬目錄，包含伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property specifies the path to the page or user control that contains the current control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A>屬性會指定包含目前控制項的網頁或使用者控制項的路徑。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the Web page resides at http://www.contoso.com/application/subdirectory, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property returns "application/subdirectory".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 Web 網頁位於http://www.contoso.com/application/subdirectory、<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A>屬性會傳回 「 應用程式/子目錄"。

trans-unit.source: To return the application-relative virtual path ("~/subdirectory"), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳回應用程式相對虛擬路徑 ("~ / 子目錄")，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property twice.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A>兩次屬性。

trans-unit.source: The first time it is used in a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.MapPathSecure%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method call to obtain the path to the directory in which the control resides.
trans-unit.target: 在第一次<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.MapPathSecure%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法呼叫來取得要在控制項所在的目錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: The second time it is in a <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method call to obtain the list of all the files contained within that directory.
trans-unit.target: 在第二次<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法呼叫，以取得包含在該目錄內的所有檔案的清單。

trans-unit.source: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 導致對伺服器控制項的檢視狀態變更的追蹤 (Tracking)，以便它們能夠儲存於伺服器控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件可透過 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> 屬性存取。

trans-unit.source: This method is called automatically at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event in the server control's lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的結尾會自動呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>伺服器控制項的生命週期中的事件。

trans-unit.source: Invoke this method when you develop templated data-bound controls.
trans-unit.target: 當您開發樣板化資料繫結控制項時，叫用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method alerts ASP.NET to monitor changes to a server control's view state, which is required when you override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法，系統會通知 ASP.NET 監視變更為伺服器控制項的檢視狀態，您覆寫時，就需要<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method in a custom ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項中的方法。

trans-unit.source: It begins by calling the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A> method and then uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> method to delete all the child controls and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A> method to delete any saved view-state settings for those child controls.
trans-unit.target: 它一開始會藉由呼叫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A>方法，然後使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Clear%2A>方法，以刪除所有子控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A>方法，以都刪除任何儲存的檢視狀態設定為這些子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The control then uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property to determine whether view-state change tracking is enabled for the control.
trans-unit.target: 然後使用控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>屬性來判斷是否啟用控制項的檢視狀態變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: If it is not enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果未啟用，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique, hierarchically qualified identifier for the server control.
trans-unit.target: 取得伺服器控制項唯一的、符合階層架構的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified identifier for the server control.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器控制項的完整識別項。

trans-unit.source: This property differs from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property, in that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> property includes the identifier for the server control's naming container.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與不同<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>中的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>屬性包含識別項，為伺服器控制項的命名容器。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is generated automatically when a page request is processed.
trans-unit.target: 處理頁面要求時，會自動產生這個識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This property is particularly important in differentiating server controls contained within a data-binding server control that repeats.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是特別重要，尤其區別包含重複的資料繫結伺服器控制項中的伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The repeating control, which are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> Web server controls (or any custom server controls that you create that include repeating functionality when data bound), serves as the naming container for its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 重複的控制項，也就是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>Web 伺服器控制項 （或自訂的任何伺服器控制項，您建立包含重複的功能，當資料繫結），做為命名其子控制項容器。

trans-unit.source: This means that it creates a unique namespace for its child controls so that their <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property values do not conflict.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，它會建立唯一的命名空間及其子系控制項，讓其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性值不會產生衝突。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you include an ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> Web server control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> server control, and assign the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property value of `MyLabel`, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> of `MyRepeater`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您包含 ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> Web 伺服器控制項中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>伺服器控制項，並指派<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性值為`MyLabel`，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> 的`MyRepeater`.

trans-unit.source: If you bind data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object with three entries, the resulting <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> properties for each instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> server controls are `MyRepeater$ctl00$MyLabel`, `MyRepeater$ctl01$MyLabel`, and `MyRepeater$ctl02$MyLabel`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要的資料繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>至<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>具有三個項目，所產生的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>每個執行個體的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>伺服器控制項是`MyRepeater$ctl00$MyLabel`， `MyRepeater$ctl01$MyLabel`，和`MyRepeater$ctl02$MyLabel`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object and populates it with three text strings, then binds a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> Web server control to the data in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> when the page is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>物件並填入三個文字字串，然後將繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>Web 伺服器控制項中的資料，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>時載入的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The code gets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> property for each child control generated during data binding.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會取得<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>資料繫結期間所產生的每個子控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The code generates three versions of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control and writes their `UniqueID` property values to the page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會產生三個版本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項和寫入其`UniqueID`至頁面的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the server control is unloaded from memory.
trans-unit.target: 發生於伺服器控制項從記憶體卸載時。

trans-unit.source: Server controls must perform any final clean-up, such as closing files, database connections and discarding objects, during this stage of the control lifecycle before the instance is unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器控制項都必須執行任何最後清除工作，例如關閉檔案、 資料庫連接，以及在此階段中控制生命週期的執行個體已卸載之前捨棄物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control checks client input from the browser for potentially dangerous values.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否對來自瀏覽器的用戶端輸入檢查潛在的危險值。

trans-unit.source: A value that determines whether the control checks client input.
trans-unit.target: 決定控制項是否檢查用戶端輸入的值。

trans-unit.source: Values can include <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Disabled" />, <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Enabled" />, and <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Inherit" />.
trans-unit.target: 值可包括 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Disabled" />、<see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Enabled" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Inherit" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Inherit" />, which means that the control gets the value from its parent.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Inherit" />，這表示控制項會從其父代取得值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about request validation, see <xref:System.Web.UnvalidatedRequestValues>.
trans-unit.target: 如需要求驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UnvalidatedRequestValues>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a server control across multiple requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: 取得狀態資訊的字典，允許您在相同網頁的多個要求之間，儲存和還原伺服器控制項的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> class that contains the server control's view-state information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 類別的執行個體，包含伺服器控制項的檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: A server control's view state is the accumulation of all its property values.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器控制項的檢視狀態是累積的所有屬性值。

trans-unit.source: In order to preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class, to store the property values.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留這些值在 HTTP 要求，ASP.NET 伺服器控制項使用這個屬性，這是執行個體的<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>類別，以儲存屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML hidden input element when subsequent requests are processed.
trans-unit.target: 值會接著為變數時傳遞至 HTML 隱藏 input 元素，處理後續的要求。

trans-unit.source: For more information about saving server control view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需儲存伺服器控制項檢視狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: View state is enabled for all server controls by default, but there are circumstances in which you will want to disable it.
trans-unit.target: 檢視狀態所有的伺服器控制項的預設啟用，但您會想要停用它的情況下。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 效能概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。

trans-unit.source: For information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872).
trans-unit.target: 字典和使用方式的相關資訊，請參閱[集合和資料結構](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates implementing a `Text` property that stores and retrieves its value from its control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範實作`Text`屬性儲存和擷取其值從其控制<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 物件是否不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> instance is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 執行個體不區分大小寫，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則，即為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you create a custom server control that saves its view state without taking case into account.
trans-unit.target: 如果您建立自訂伺服器可儲存其檢視狀態，而不考慮大小寫，覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: When you do so multiple objects with the same key, but with different casing, can be stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您這樣做，多個物件具有相同的金鑰，但大小寫不同時，可以儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>聯<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateIgnoresCase%2A> property to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateIgnoresCase%2A>屬性，以傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the view-state mode of this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個控制項的檢視狀態模式。

trans-unit.source: The view-state mode of this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項的檢視狀態模式。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property to enable view state for an individual control even if view state is disabled for the page.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>屬性來啟用個別控制項的檢視狀態，即使頁面停用檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information about view state and control state, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關檢視狀態，以及控制項狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To disable view state for a page and to enable it for a specific control on the page, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property of the page and the control to `true`, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property of the page to <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Disabled>, and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property of the control to <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用頁面的檢視狀態，並啟用特定控制項在頁面上，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>頁面和控制項的屬性`true`，將<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>屬性頁面，即可<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Disabled>，並設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>屬性若要控制<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property for a page is <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>屬性頁面是<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property for a Web server control in a page is <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Inherit>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>屬性頁面中的 Web 伺服器控制項是<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Inherit>。

trans-unit.source: As a result, if you do not set this property at either the page or the control level, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property determines view-state behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，如果您未在頁面或控制層級的值設定這個屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性決定檢視狀態行為。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property of a page or a control has an effect only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>網頁或控制項的屬性有效果才<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is set to `false`, view state will be turned off even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性設定為`false`，檢視狀態將會關閉，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value that is not in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 已嘗試將此屬性設定為不屬於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode" /> 列舉中的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a server control is rendered as UI on the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出伺服器控制項是否會轉譯為頁面上的 UI。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is visible on the page; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項在頁面上可見，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, the server control is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`false`，則不會呈現伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: You should take this into account when organizing the layout of your page.
trans-unit.target: 您應該考慮這組織您的頁面配置時。

trans-unit.source: If a container control is not rendered, any controls that it contains will not be rendered even if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property of an individual control to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果容器控制項時，不會轉譯任何它所包含的控制項將不會轉譯即使您將<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>以個別控制項的屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the individual control returns `false` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property even if you have explicitly set it to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，個別控制項傳回`false`如<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>屬性，即使您已明確地將它設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: (That is, if the `Visible` property of the parent control is set to `false`, the child control inherits that setting and the setting takes precedence over any local setting.)
trans-unit.target: (亦即，如果`Visible`父控制項的屬性設定為`false`，子控制項繼承該設定，並設定優先於任何本機設定。)
